title: Crashing during banning phase
body: Second time ive had it happen to me this patch, has happened both times after I get into promos, tried looking into it and dont get really any results on how to fix it, game just crashes after bans are selected on the last one and whole client turns white and unable to do anything other then exit out and reopen. Not sure if its because of promos or if im just unlucky enough to get it when I enter them but still losing LP/getting a penalty for no reason. Any solution to help lemme know thanks.

replies.body:
This white-pane overlay type-issue happens if the application (in this case, League) stops responding. This typically happens with the League client if your connection to the platform server is **unstable**. This could be for a number of reasons, however, you can find a list of the steps that frequently fix these issues in our [**connection guide.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Please let me know if this resolved the issue.
